metadata.name: Carrier
metadata.summary: A character-driven immersion in the high-stakes world of a nuclear aircraft carrier.
metadata.description: CARRIER, a 10-part series filmed aboard the USS Nimitz, is a character-driven immersion in the high- stakes world of a nuclear aircraft carrier. The episodes follow a core group of characters as they navigate their jobs, families, faith, patriotism, love, the rites of passage and the war on terror.
metadata.keywords: PBS, military, USS Nimitz, Iraq war, Marines, war, aircraft, documentary
